org.treetank.service.xml.xpath
Class AtomicValue

java.lang.Object
  org.treetank.service.xml.xpath.AtomicValue
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.treetank.node.interfaces.INode, org.treetank.node.interfaces.IValNode
public class AtomicValue
extends Object
implements org.treetank.node.interfaces.INode, org.treetank.node.interfaces.IValNode

AtomicValue

An item represents either an atomic value or a node. An atomic value is a value in the value space of an atomic type, as defined in XMLSchema 1.1. (Definition: Atomic types are anyAtomicType and all types derived from it.)
